A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After weeks of avoiding trailers\, attending my local premier alone (no babysitter) at 9:30pm by 11:30 I was already researching reviews. It's like Disney took what everyone liked about TFA and stretched it out for 3.5 hours. The combat was weak\, the plot thin\, no questions were answered\, awkward performances by Luke and Leia. This is truly a disappointment. Disney needs to get out of the dad jokes and focus more on the cannon. I'd recommend you wait for the redox.
